Posts.Content: May 20, 2012 09:02PM sueshane wrote: I hope I don't offend anyone with my comments- I know there is no miracle drug out there.  However, I have heard that soursop is suppose to be a miracle for cancer.  I have heard of three different cases where CA was eliminated after taking soursop- CA of the throat, ovaries and breast- three different people.   Wishing you all the best, Susan
Posts.Title: No, you don't understand... Stormynyte Reneepals

Posts.Content: Apr 30, 2012 09:47PM sueshane wrote: I really can't give you any advice except to take a deep breath and wait to worry until you have to worry. I remember getting my biopsy and really thought I might get bad news.  It was Labor Day weekend, so I was unlucky enough to have to wait one more day until Tuesday morning when I got the CA news.  If I had been a basket case that weekend, it would have been a very stressful and long weekend.  Instead, I went about my business until I needed to go into high gear with treatment options. If you are dx with cancer, find the best surgeon and oncologist in your area.  Best of luck to you,  Susan
